about_the_game:
"Florida's a wasteland. A testament to the world's collapse. You've been condemned - sentenced to die in a spectacle of car combat. You might not remember better times, but prisoner, I see potential..."

A throwback from the classic car combat era, set in a post-apocalyptic sunny south Florida! Wreckage exists in an alternate timeline where Lead-based gasoline was not banned, and crime waves decimated the sunshine state. From the opening crawl you are a prisoner, condemned to die by car combat. You escape the stadium and into the crowds. And from there, who knows...

Game modes:
  • Singleplayer driver campaigns
  • Roguelite co-op mode for 1-4 players
  • Challenge mode
  • Versus mode

Features:
  • Twisted Metal in Florida!!
  • Old school visuals, updated controls
  • Fast-paced arcade "Car brawler"
  • 9+ Florida drivers
  • 21+ real destructible Florida locations
  • 50+ weapon attachments and upgrades
  • Rioting pedestrian hordes armed to the teeth
  • Rich overworld story exploring the Lead-crime Hypothesis
  • Comic book style cutscenes

Roadmap:
  • Coming soon...

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.5
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 series or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Ryzen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SteamDeck APU or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A brutal car combat game about surviving deadly battles in crime-ravaged Florida. Upgrade your vehicle, fight through iconic Florida locations, and destroy everything in sight as you carve a path through riots and urban devastation.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
